extendedInfo.description: Smart Screen on/off with sensors..Smart Screen on/off with sensors..Please watch youtube video. Long life time for on/off button with 'Close It'. It works with sensors or a widget.Change Ringer Mode,Select Flight Mode,Shutdown or Restart phone (for Rooted phone only)Long life time for on/off button with 'Close It' widget..11 in 1 only one application. Please watch youtube video before use..Â  Â  Â  Â  1. Screen off with proximity sensorÂ  Â  2. Screen off accelerometer sensor (Shake)Â  Â  3. Screen off with reverse modeÂ  Â  4. Screen on with proximity sensorÂ  Â  5. Screen on with accelerometer sensor (Shake)Â  Â  6. Mute incoming call with upside down phone    7. Screen off phone with widget or shortcut    8. Shutdown  Phone (for ROOTed phone only)    9. Restart Phone (for ROOTed phone only)    10. Flight mode on / off    11. Select ringer mode (Silent,Vibrate,Sound)         - Remove and add Device Admin permission easly from setup menuÂ  Â  - Easly Uninstall from own menuImportant : to use sensors, Close It must be run as a service on your phone, if you dont want this (off course 6 properties will not work) you can use just a widget for sleep mode..If you want to support me, just click ad from menu..Note: For uninstall please open and  slide bottom of "Close It" menu after you can see uninstall choice!!or watch youtube video!!---Tags : smart screen on/off,Lock Screen Widget, Close It,Close Screen,lock screen with proximity sensor, lock screen with accelerometer sensor, wake up screen with proximity sensor, wake up screen with accelerometer sensor, mute incoming call,

reviews.title: At last...one that works
reviews.comment: The shake on/off works well on my Nexus 4,doesn\'t use too much battery and doesn\'t cause an annoying low background hum....excellent.The proximity on/off is not so good but this app is still the best I\'ve found yet.
reviews.author: Chad Coleman

reviews.title: Useless.
reviews.comment: Where is setup? All I get is an icon resulting in a popup
reviews.author: Lord Childe

reviews.title: Hell yeah
reviews.comment: My power button starting sinking, now I just use this - move my hand or just shake my phone to wake/sleep and takes me to my lock screen (unlike some others)
reviews.author: Flip C

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: Great App. Keep up the good work. Cheers.
reviews.author: Pramod V Shinde

reviews.comment: very bad

reviews.title: wow
reviews.comment: works real well.
reviews.author: jocelyn duong

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: It work well for the proximity on off. The tolerance of near-far-near is good. No need to hit the timing so precisely.  Didn\'t test about wave on off
reviews.author: Jack Voo Woon Hoong

reviews.title: To all...
reviews.comment: It works!  Galaxy s3. Thanks dev.

reviews.title: Good apps
reviews.comment: Every function work well on my Nexus 4. Thanks for kindly support from developer.

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: This is the best aplication, i have been using many programs to lock up and unlock my phone and no one works like this ones. Thnkx its just the.best, perfect. Love it.

reviews.comment: Shake to wake seems not to work, but other features make it worth keeping and helpful.

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Works very nice in my Micromax A116 HD and thanks for making a good application. I have some feedbacks for u. It does not open the screen sometimes in shake mode but locks well. If u can fix this issue up then i will be greatfull to u and happy to buy a paid version having very good options without any problems. Do not give negative comments if it doesn\'t work as mentioned it may not work in all the mobiles
reviews.author: SUV RA
